title: 11:11: A Book of Poetry
description: Do you frequently see number patterns? The Universe may be trying to catch your attention. Many believe there is no such thing as coincidence. We live in a world full of signs, symbols, and synchronicities. Each number, in the mathematical language of the universe, carries its own energetic vibration and meaning. The inspirational messages in this book help to reveal the hidden meaning behind common number patternsâ€”and celebrates our mysterious relationship with the Universe. As individuals, each of us will have a unique interpretation of the recurring number patterns we see. How do you feel when you see 11:11?
author: Connie Pillon
